entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
